children.value: Get latest version of Guify off of NPM
This is what happens when you have a 3D scanner and too much free time. Above is a 3D scan of my head rigged for animation and hooked up to a modified version of
, which simulates the nose and throat to produce synthesized human vocals. You can play around with the controls in the upper-right.

Regrettably, this program supports MIDI playback. Use the GUI to load a MIDI file and start the playback. Keep in mind that as of right now (wink wink nudge nudge) only one track is played, which you can control with the “Track” control in the GUI.
Thanks to Toni Kaplan for repairing and rigging the 3D model.

frontmatter.title: Jon-Trombone
frontmatter.subtitle: A tragic monument to vanity
frontmatter.description: What happens when you have a 3D scanner and too much free time?
